Chapter 6 Interactive component For the interactive component, we create a Sunburst chart to summarize our data through the years. The radial sunburst is divided among 3 main data models: Juvenile Arrests: Number of Juvenile Arrests made by Race Demographics from 2010-2019 Gun Violence: Number of deaths from 2010-2019 Reported Offenses: Number of Crimes reported from 2010-2019. This can be explored by: Number of Incidents by State Number of Incidents by Offense Types We can thus, visualize the changing number throughout the years.
